Welcome to Kanban Backend’s documentation!

class todo.models.Category(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Represents a category for tasks in the Kanban app.

Fields:

name (str): The name of the category.

__str__()[source]

Returns a string representation of the category.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
class todo.models.Todo(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Represents a task or item on a to-do list.

Fields:
parameter title (str):

The title of the todo.

parameter description (str):

The description of the todo.

parameter due_date (datetime):

The due date of the todo.

parameter urgency (str):

The urgency level of the todo.

parameter status (str):

The status of the todo.

parameter Category (Category):

The category of the todo.

parameter assigned_to (User):

The users assigned to the todo.

parameter created_at (date):

The date the todo was created.

parameter author (User):

The author of the todo.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
class todo.serializers.CategorySerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Serializer class for the Category model.

This serializer is used to convert Category model instances into JSON representation and vice versa.

Fields:
parameter id (int):

The ID of the category.

parameter name (str):

The name of the category.

class todo.serializers.TodoSerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Serializer for the Todo model.

Fields:
parameter id (int):

The ID of the todo.

parameter title (str):

The title of the todo.

parameter description (str):

The description of the todo.

parameter due_date (int):

The due date of the todo.

parameter urgency (str):

The urgency level of the todo.

parameter status (str):

The current status of the todo.

parameter category (Category):

The category of the todo.

parameter assigned_to (list):

The users assigned to the todo.

parameter author (User):

The author of the todo.

class todo.serializers.UserSerializer(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Serializer class for the User model.

This serializer is used to convert User model instances into JSON representations and vice versa. It specifies the fields that should be included in the serialized output.

Fields:
parameter model (class):

The User model class.

parameter fields (list):

The list of fields to be included in the serialized output.
